name: Zitrax
overview: A freewae horizontally scrolling shooter created by Dimmen Produkties in 1988. This shooter is different because just like in reality, you only have one life so you had better guard it well. It was released in both International Arcade Action and the Amiga Stars Collection. Fast and furious arcade action. Dare you enter into space, if you do there are waves of aliens, doing everything in their power to stop you. For those with fast reaction and shoot-em up skills.... take the challenge.
